events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection, causing significant damage to the front bumper.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords identified in the initial customer report and description of the incident.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle further communications and verify claim details with the customer.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer that the investigation process will begin shortly.
Requested accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration documents from the customer to proceed with the investigation.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle parts.
The investigation team has begun evaluating the submitted evidence and contacting involved parties for additional statements.
Investigation found the accident was due to another driver’s negligence, confirming the liability of the third party.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover repair costs for the damaged vehicle and associated expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and requested expedited processing of the payment.
The claim has been approved based on the investigation outcomes and the agreed settlement terms.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer’s bank account to cover the claimed damages for the auto accident.
The claim has been formally closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer that all issues are resolved.
All case files and documents related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived in the system for future reference.
